Headline: Delays Affecting Loop-bound Brown Line Trains
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are experiencing moving delays leaving Kimball. Expect longer than usual wait times. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are experiencing moving delays leaving Kimball. Expect longer than usual wait times.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
